fields.description:
Upgrade Titanium Alloy to use new UnderscoreJS version 1.9.1 that was released at May 2018

[*Changelog*|https://underscorejs.org/#changelog]

comments.body: Previous PR and ticket for reference https://github.com/appcelerator/alloy/pull/870 ALOY-1534

*Closing ticket* Able to see the upgrade to {{UnderscoreJS}} using CLI version {{7.1.0-master.21}}. Also ran Kitchen-SinkV2 to ensure everything was working as expected. 

*Test Environment*
{code:java}
SDK: 8.0.2.GA
Operating System
  Name                        = Mac OS X
  Version                     = 10.14.4
  Architecture                = 64bit
  CPUs                      = 8
  Memory                      = 16.0GB
Node.js
  Node.js Version             = 10.13.0
  npm Version                 = 6.4.1
Appcelerator CLI
  Installer                   = 4.2.14-3
  Core Package                = 7.1.0-master.21
Titanium CLI
  CLI Version                 = 5.2.1
  node-appc Version           = 0.2.49
{code}
